import React, { Fragment, useContext, useState } from 'react' import {FcCheckmark} from 'react-icons/fc' import '../Styles/pricing.css' function Pricing() { const {toggle}=useContext(Container) const [toggleBasic,setToggleBasic]=useState(true) return (

Basic

{basicCost}$

{toggleBasic ? '/Monthly':'/Yearly'}

Unlimited films and tv programs watch on mobile phones and tablets Cancel at anytime First month completly free
{setToggleBasic(!toggleBasic)}}>
) } export default Pricing
